casebody.data:
Thomas Greg ENGEL, Appellant,
v.
Kenneth DEAN, Respondent. WD 80818 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: March 20, 2018 George Smith, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. John Roark, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Amanda Miller, Columbia, MO, Co-Counsel for Respondent. Before Division One: Thomas H. Newton, P.J., Victor C. Howard, and Anthony Rex Gabbert, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Professor Thomas Greg Engel appeals a Boone County Circuit Court judgment sustaining the summary-judgment motion filed by Mr. Kenneth Dean in a dispute over actions taken in 2010-2012 in a failed effort by faculty to remove Dr. Engel's tenured status at the University of Missouri-Columbia. For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
